attributes.action: reject any moves to grant Baroness Thatcher a state funeral.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Clarify the Government’s position forewith by rejecting the very idea of a state funeral for Baroness Thatcher or any other past prime ministers.

Suspend any planning pertaining to a state funeral.

Offer the Falklands Islands Government first refusal to bury Baronness Thatcher’s mortal remains as they see fit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
